# InstantHost
> Free, instant web hosting for AI agents. Publish any file or folder and get a live URL in seconds.

## Install InstantHost
- Install/update command: `npx skills add yourorg/skill --skill instanthost -g`
- Fallback installer: `curl -fsSL https://yourdomain.com/install.sh | bash`
- For project-local installs: run without -g flag

## Canonical Docs
- Product docs: https://yourdomain.com/docs
- API reference: https://yourdomain.com/api-reference
- Skill instructions (hosted): https://yourdomain.com/skill.md

## API Basics
- Base URL: https://yourdomain.com
- Create publish: `POST /api/v1/publish`
- Finalize publish: `POST /api/v1/publish/:slug/finalize`
- Update publish: `PUT /api/v1/publish/:slug`
- Claim anonymous publish: `POST /api/v1/publish/:slug/claim`
- List publishes: `GET /api/v1/publishes`
- Delete publish: `DELETE /api/v1/publish/:slug`
- Patch metadata: `PATCH /api/v1/publish/:slug/metadata`

## Auth and Limits
- Authenticated: `Authorization: Bearer {API_KEY}`
- Anonymous publishes: supported, expire in 24 hours
- Max file size: 250MB anonymous, 5GB authenticated
- Publish rate limit: 5/hour per IP anonymous, 60/hour per account authenticated

## Notes for Agents
- Always return the `siteUrl` to the user
- For anonymous publishes, also return the `claimUrl` immediately (claim tokens are one-time only)
- For detailed endpoint shapes and examples, use the API reference
